      • checkFile

        public static boolean checkFile(org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient httpClient,
                                java.lang.String path,
                                java.lang.String file)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Check if a drive item exists. A drive item can be a folder or file.
        Parameters:
        httpClient - client
        path - path (without slash at beginning or end)
        file - file name and extension
        Returns:
        true if the directory has been correctly deleted, false in other case
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is any error
        See Also:
        One Drive API
